name: Tokyo Graffiti Archive #0007
description:
Between 2017 and 2020, I intensively photographed illegal graffiti in Tokyo. "Tokyo Graffiti Archive" series is an attempt to preserve the results as NFT.

Graffiti is illegal and often erased soon. It is natural, but cultural values need to be preserved somewhere. I think NFT is well suited for this purpose.

Rather than focusing on a single piece of graffiti, I chose a photo of multiple pieces of graffiti that come together to form a single landscape.
